alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 7:54PM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills between 40 and 50 below zero. * WHERE...Bighorn Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most susceptible parts of the body to frostbite are the extremities such as fingers, toes and the tip of the nose. If you must go outside, try to stay out of the wind, and dress in several layers of loose fitting, lightweight, warm clothing.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
